name: ESPMeshNow
keywords: communication, iot, automation, async, async-tcp, async-tcp-ssl, async-mqtt, mqtt, async-mqtt-client, esp32, esp32-s2, esp32-s3, esp32-c3, wt32-eth01, ethernet, espnow, mesh
description: This library, ported to support ESP32/S2/S3/C3, WT32_ETH01 (ESP32 + LAN8720), implements a custom self-healing offline devices resistant mesh net using ESPNow
